Not recommending because its not for me, it functions fine and I'm sure it'd be great for those who love this type.

Works Well on steam deck in spite of not being verified for it.

Appealed to me because of mythology, and I've even enjoyed some RTS like games but maybe they were all lighter then this. It'll stick with Titan Quest for that fix.

There is the new enhanced version (which is also getting new DLC it seems, getting a very frustrating trend in gaming, all these games releasing 90% the same content for a shiny paint job but then adding new stuff so its buy that or be stuck with an incomplete version), which weirdly seems cheaper then the base price on this (only by 50p but still), so I guess if you want it you may as well look at that version.

184571965.review: I've played this game when I was younger and it still holds up. I love how some chapters can be a little challenging and make you think how to use your resources.

184519159.review: This game just keeps giving, the original campaign is so good, i've played it multiple times.  i love the myth units, they just make everything so fun and flavorful.  you really feel like you're playing distinct races in this game, more like Starcraft than age of empires in that way (which i like).  I could see some people not liking the autobuild functionality but to be honest it makes this game a lot easier to get into if you're new and sometimes it's nice to not have to constantly engage with building villagers while you're enjoying the huge battles!  also huge points for the map editor, there's a lot of fun you can have building your own maps and campaigns if you're willing to learn the system

184029178.review: Um dos melhores jogos de estratégia em tempo real em relação a Mitologia que já joguei! Me diverti jogando com variadas mitologias, construindo assentamentos, evoluindo edificações e criando tropas e exércitos. Muito legal usar os poderes dos deuses para contra-atacar os adversários! Jogo bastante intuitivo e educativo, além da lore da campanha ser muito interessante. -by CEO of CSG Studios

183942370.review: Brings back memories from years ago when you could play any of the gods from all pantheons.  I recommend this and the new version a try.

183922654.review: Detestei ter comprado o Extended, pq mexeram demais no equilibrio das forças de cada cultura, se eu pudesse eu desinstalaria esse mod e ficaria com o jogo normal. Simplesmente meteram arqueiros pros Nordicos, uma unidade The Flash nos egipcios, um monge nos Gregos e um trebuchet da 25 de março no Atlantes. Tudo cagado e mal feito, além disso as unidades chinesas não tem sombra 2D, que dava a impressão de oclusão de ambiente quando vc restaura o modo nativo do jogo, então parecem que tão flutuando sobre o mapa, a IA também se esforçaram pra melhorar, mas simplesmente a cultura chinesa é quebrada em vários aspectos, cavalaria que só custa 2 de população (todas as outras culturas custa no minimo 3), e cada deus parece um port mal feito das outras culturas. Non-sense.

183799662.review: They ruined the game. It's nearly impossible to win a game unless its on easy. I've played this game for several years, they decided to give the NPC infinite resources even on "moderate". No longer even playable. No matter what you do you will not be able to produce resources as fast as the NPC player, completely destroyed the game. Don't waste your money or time, game has been rendered nearly unplayable.

183763988.review:
Age of Mythology has always been a nice way to turn off your brains and just massacre the enemies' villages.
Made me pretty happy to have found it on steam, when you've only had the CD-ROM for it :) 

I don't really care about the new packages you can purchase, or the updates whatsoever. I'm happy the old game is available to play! One of the best strategy games ever - better than Age of Empires, in my honest opinion.

183659877.review:
You know what? It worked, it really worked. I was having fun playing an old game from my youth, then all of a sudden the UI went black and white. The game became "not recommended" literally because the developers told me it was, and I believed them. I went ahead and bought retold. I am a pushover with no backbone whatsoever, and I hate being alive.

At least the arena of the gods content in retold is something fun to do, and to be fair to them the Chinese campaign is buttcheeks to play

183538304.review: For anyone who's never known much about greek, egyptian or Norse Mythology this is a great game to get a surface level understanding of a variety of cultures in one go, game plays like Age of Empires 2 in terms of mechanics but instead of stone you get Favour. fun game to waste 30 hours on

183526193.review: excelente para jogar com os amigos

183519250.review:
Двадцять років минуло, а я досі не можу дивитися на цю гру без бажання пограти. Скільки сотень годин було в неї награно до Стіма я думати боюсь, в мене лише дисків було три різних, але вижив лише один. 
Найкращий симулятор божественного гніву й найкумедніші чіт-коди на юнітів, яких в базовій грі ніде немає. Та й загалом чудова стратегія, непогані кампанії й попри дуже поважний вік чудова гра. Я здаюся, не можу більше писати, піду ще пограю, бо це неможливо.
